metadata.title: CVE-2020-25866 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.2.0 to 3.2.6 and 3.0.0 to 3.0.13, the BLIP protocoldissector has a NULL pointer dereference because a buffer was sized forcompressed (not uncompressed) messages. This was addressed inepan/dissectors/packet-blip.c by allowing reasonable compression ratios andrejecting ZIP bombs.

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
